original_text: At the end of twenty years, in which Solomon had built the two houses, the house of the Lord and the king's house,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 두 집 곧 여호와의 성전과 왕궁을 이십 년 만에 건축하기를 마치고

sentences.original_text: At the end of twenty years,
in which Solomon had built the two houses,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기간 동안 솔로몬이 두 집을 건축하였으니,
